explains: n. 芜菁，萝卜；芜菁块根，芜菁甘蓝块根；类芜菁甘蓝块根；<非正式>大而厚的老式表

sentences.en: A turnip is another root vegetable.
sentences.cn: 萝卜是另一种根茎类蔬菜。

sentences.en: The iron horse conducted the wood pig and turnip rabbit to play programs.
sentences.cn: 铁皮马指挥木头猪和萝卜兔演节目。

sentences.en: He yoked his oxen, and drew the turnip to the court, and gave it to the king.
sentences.cn: 他给他的牛套上牛轭，把萝卜牵到院子里，献给国王。
